comments.raw_text:
When verifying a self-signed certificate using the two methods, the results are:
attempting CERT_PKIXVerifyCert... error: -8179 = Peer's Certificate issuer is not recognized.
attempting CERT_VerifyCertNow... error: -8172 = Peer's certificate issuer has been marked as not trusted by the user.
bsmith says these should be the same.
comments.author: dkeeler@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 552148
selfsigned.c

When verifying a self-signed certificate using the two methods, the results are:
attempting CERT_PKIXVerifyCert... error: -8179 = Peer's Certificate issuer is not recognized.
attempting CERT_VerifyCertNow... error: -8172 = Peer's certificate issuer has been marked as not trusted by the user.
bsmith says these should be the same.
comments.creator: dkeeler@mozilla.com
